title: Specialization
content: If i take cyber security specialization now . will i have to do the same in sixth semester also?or can i take mids specialization in 6th sem

comments.body:
You can take courses from any specialisation, there is no restriction. 

The specialisation certificate is awarded **if you take all 4 electives from the same group**. Otherwise, no specialisation but it is still a valid selection of courses.
